pages.speaker: npc

pages.speaker: npc
lines: These items come in pairs of sixteen. Would you like 16 Torches for $600?

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Money=600..}] run give @s minecraft:torch 16');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Money=600..}] run playsound minecraft:entity.experience_orb.pickup ambient @s ~ ~ ~ 1 1 1');
